title: edjing free DJ mix rec studio
creator: DJiT

extendedInfo.description: Voted as Best App of the Year at the AppAwards 2013â edjing is the best Pro DJ app on Android ââedjing is more than just a successful app, it stands out by its wide range of effects offer and its smooth usage.â Androidmag.deItâs the 1st social DJ App to Play, Mix and Share your sounds for free! A perfect way to share your passion for music and let others discover your mixing talent! â SOUNDCLOUDEnjoy access to SoundCloud and Mix all the music you love!â JUST LIKE A REAL DJ WOULD: Realize professional-like transitions thanks to the crossfader. Match the beats manually or click on the Sync button to synchronize the bpm (beats per minute) of your tracks and achieve seamless transitions.â PLAY. MIX. SHARE & PARTY! ;)Being a DJ has never been so easy! Party all night with edjing! Impress your friends during parties by mixing your songs like a real DJ or let this friendly DJ app mix your playlists while youâre dancing your heart out!Indeed, thanks to the Auto mix function, edjing does all the transitions for you. You can customize the transition you want and request the auto synchronization of bpm (auto sync bpm option) so that the beats of your music always match.Have fun remixing the trendiest tracks of the moment on your new pocket turntables!â FEEL THE BEATS & REINVENT YOUR MUSIC:Add all the effects you like and keep reinventing the music you love! Scratch or add special sound effects to enrich your mix and create new sounds: your sound!Enjoy a wide range of sound effects. 7 free FX available: scratch, flanger, echo, loop, pitch, equalizer, cue point. You can add multiple effects at the same time: scratch on a loop or add a Flanger on a loop for instance.You can also get more awesome effects via our in-app Store!All the effects are available via the FX menu (FX button at the bottom of the turntable)â RECORD & SHARE YOUR CREATIONS WITH YOUR FRIENDS:Record your mixes and share them with your friends on Facebook and Twitter thanks to the "eMix" feature. Record up to a whole hour of mixing. After recording your mix, donât forget to share them with your friends.â Let yourself immerse in a world of music: yours! YOU ARE THE DJ, NOW IT'S OVER TO YOU!edjing is the new flagship app! More than 3,5 millions Downloads already! Join our DJ community and take control of your parties!  Play. Mix. Share.More than 2,5 million people already use edjing to mix their music ! Subscribe now and join the world largest social network of DJ to be! N.B: edjing has developed its own Sound System to offer you the best audio experience possible: real time sound processing enabling you to mix your music live with increasingly realistic DJ effects.edjing also gives you the possibility to listen to your mixes and those of your friends on its internet website: www.edjing.comDiscover the top mixed tracks! Who will record the most comments on his/her mix? Who will top the rankings of the most listened mixes and get to shine? Itâs fun and free!Make your move! Play. Mix. ShareGeneral Characteristics: â OS: Android 4.0 and moreâ Screen Compatibility: from 3.7ââ to 10ââ and more â RAM size > 1GB (recommended)â eMix function to share your mix on Facebook and Twitter (depending on Android phone)â Access to your music library to mix all your tracks â 2 Turntables + Cross Fader â Scratch / Pitch on Vinyl like a real DJâ Free DJ effects (FX): Cue, Flanger, Loop, Echo, equalizerâ Wide Sound Spectrum for optimum Beats localization â A store with additional effects (FX): Reverse, Double flipping, Auto Scratch, Reverbsâ The possibility to earn vinyls to buy effectsâ Recording in High Definition CD quality, wave format â "AutoMix" mode for automatic transitions between titles of your playlists â BPM synchronization (sync)â Ability to remix mp3 files of more than 1 hourContact us at support@edjing.com for any feedback!TAGS : dj, mix, turntable, turntables, scratch, beats, mixer, traktor, djay, virtual dj, deejay

reviews.title: Unbelievable
reviews.comment: Amazing app. To think you can mix you favorite music right on you own phone. I love it. Its Entertaining . Jam Master J. Would not belive this. Thanks

reviews.title: Very good apps
reviews.comment: Fun n easy to play. Cool mixing using high amps.

reviews.comment: Very user friendly app...easy to navigate.

reviews.title: Chopped & Screwed
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to chop & screw some music. For those of you who don\'t know, thatz an H-Town thang. Anyways, the turn tables seem to lag and I can\'t get the song to chop on point. But the Djay app on the iPhone works just fine. Maybe take some pointers from them and get it right.

reviews.comment: Had tons of fun using this app ,definitely worth getting,just a shame the best features are locked, but worth it.

reviews.title: Excellent app the best yet for android devices
reviews.comment: In stead of seeing bpm only it would be nice if u could switch between seeing pitch speed and bpm also if u can choose to use the eq on de app S well as your Android\'s eq apart from dat excellent app the best I\'ve seen for an Android device.

reviews.comment: Can\'t even play a song without it skipping all the time.. Let alone play two songs at once..
